rules.ruleString: Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {MGF3681, MGG3681, MGP2278, MGW3681}
Must be enrolled in course type {09-4, 10, 41, 50}
Unit was previously coded {MGC3120%, MGC3124, MGF3681, MGW3681}

description: This unit highlights the challenges of managing the global activities of international companies; examines the environmental foundations and cultural contexts for international management; discusses the impact of national cultures on management, negotiation and communication; and provides an overview of strategic, operational and human resource management issues in the dynamic international economy.
